strategyDetails:
Knock Off pressures walls that rely on their items, like Mandibuzz, Celesteela, and Chansey, and discourages Pokemon like Rotom-H and Salamence from switching in. Stone Edge threatens Pokemon immune to Ground like Gyarados, Moltres, and Rotom-H. Close Combat lets Krookodile hit targets such as Zarude, Hydreigon, Chansey, and opposing Krookodile harder. Toxic cripples switch-ins such as Tapu Bulu and Tangrowth, but since others like Amoonguss and Zarude are immune or resilient to it, it's quite matchup reliant. Darkest Lariat is useful to hit Pokemon like Rotom-W harder after they've had their items removed. Stealth Rock can be used to take advantage of Krookodile's ability to force switches against Pokemon such as Azelf and Nihilego, but it should only be used when the role compression is necessary, and it requires very good prediction. Choice Scarf turns Krookodile into a solid revenge killer, outspeeding key Pokemon and sweepers such as Lycanroc-D, Azelf, and +1 Gyarados.

This set fits well on offense, bulky offense, and balance teams that need a fast revenge killer. These kinds of teams appreciate Krookodile's defensive utility in its two immunities and Intimidate. Even though Intimidate allows Krookodile to take on physical attacks a bit better, it shouldn't be relied on, so teammates like Aegislash and Tangrowth help it against wallbreakers like Lycanroc-D. Assault Vest Tangrowth takes on threatening Water-types such as Primarina, Rotom-W, and Keldeo well. Strong wallbreakers such as Thundurus-T and Nidoking can get past Krookodile's checks such as Slowking, Skarmory, and Tapu Bulu, allowing it to spam its STAB moves more freely. Krookodile is helpless against Grass-types, so partners that can pressure them like Nihilego and Mamoswine are great. Rotom-H is another good teammate that can scare away Grass-types and brings Krookodile in on checks like Nihilego. Entry hazard support from teammates such as Nihilego and Jirachi is key to weaken checks like Rotom-W and Primarina. Salamence and Moltres ensure Tapu Bulu is not given free turns to wallbreak, as it can freely come into Krookodile.

pokemonAbilities.abilityDetails: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.
If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.
This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

strategyItems.itemDetails: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.

strategyAbilities.abilityDetails: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.

strategyFirstMoves.moveDetails: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dig.

strategySecondMoves.moveDetails: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

strategyFourthMoves.moveDetails: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.
Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.
